title: Brand-New Luxe Gold Coast Hinterland Retreat with Three-Course Dinner & Daily Breakfast
description: Take a moment to disconnect from the real world with a luxurious stay at Hazelwood Estate - a newly opened, boutique hinterland retreat, where the beauty of Lamington National Park meets a uniquely Australian wagyu and polo farm. Just 40 minutes from the glittering Gold Coast, this gorgeous property allows you to lose yourself in the ultimate countryside escape. Wake to views of Beechmont plateau’s undulating hills and step onto the private deck of your luxe cabin to enjoy a hot cup of coffee amid the rural serenity. When it’s time to leave your idyllic hideaway, you can put on your hiking boots to enjoy some of Australia’s best bushwalking trails, indulge in a picnic hamper on the grounds of the estate, explore the property on an e-bike or indulge with some downtime at Spa by Hazelwood.
offer_address: 422 Binna Burra Road, Beechmont 4211, Queensland, Australia

title: Grand Opening: Luxe Gold Coast Hinterland Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Three-Course Dinner
description:
Take a moment to disconnect from the real world with a luxurious stay at Hazelwood Estate - a newly opened, boutique hinterland retreat, where the beauty of Lamington National Park meets a uniquely Australian wagyu and polo farm. Just 40 minutes from the glittering Gold Coast, this gorgeous property allows you to lose yourself in the ultimate countryside escape.

Wake to views of Beechmont plateau’s undulating hills and step onto the private deck of your luxe cabin to enjoy a hot cup of coffee amid the rural serenity. When it’s time to leave your idyllic hideaway, you can experience a private horseback tour of Lamington National Park, put on your hiking boots to enjoy some of Australia’s best bushwalking trails or indulge with some downtime at Spa by Hazelwood.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Begin each day overlooking the Scenic Rim hills with daily breakfast for two
- Indulge in a nightly three-course dinner for two at The Paddock restaurant
- Delve into the world of Australian wine and cheese with a gourmet tasting experience
- Enjoy a guided tour of the estate market garden, followed by a sunset glass of wine, beer or spirit
- Arrive to a handcrafted organic chocolate bar per person

**Luxury Pavilion Upgrade**: Countryside bliss awaits in this luxe abode, positioned to enjoy sunset views, complete with a freestanding bath, lounge room with fireplace and private deck.
offer_address: 422 Binna Burra Road, Beechmont 4211, Queensland, Australia

title: Gold Coast Hinterland Rainforest Getaway
description: Discover a tranquil rainforest hideaway in the Gold Coast Hinterland. Spend three nights at the acclaimed O'Reilly's Rainforest Retreat and enjoy daily full buffet breakfasts, morning and afternoon teas, welcome drinks and decadent spa credits. Plus uncover the majestic natural surrounds with daily guided walking tours, a birds of prey show, wildlife encounter, wine tasting and more for two.
offer_address: 3582, Lamington National Park Rd, Canungra QLD 4275

title: Luxe Gold Coast Hinterland Retreat with Chef-Hatted Dinner & Daily Breakfast
description:
Take a moment to disconnect from the real world during a luxurious stay at Beechmont Estate, a boutique hinterland retreat where the beauty of Lamington National Park meets a uniquely Australian Wagyu farm. Perched among Queensland's famous Scenic Rim, just 40 minutes from the glittering Gold Coast, this gorgeous property allows you to lose yourself in the ultimate countryside escape. Wake to views of undulating hills from the private deck of your luxe cabin and enjoy a hot cup of coffee amid the rural serenity. Indulge in contemporary Australian dining at the chef-hatted farm-to-plate restaurant, explore the property on an e-bike or indulge in some downtime at the spa or by the fireplace.

Only a five-minute drive away, access the dewy grandeur of the World Heritage-listed Gondwana Rainforests at Lamington National Park - abundant with waterfalls, wildlife and nature paths - or journey to historic towns, making memories in the quaint Scenic Rim villages.
offer_address: 422 Binna Burra Road, Beechmont 4211, Queensland, Australia

title: Lavish Adults-Only Treehouse Escape in the Tamborine Mountain Rainforest
description: Discover tranquillity and take the romance up a notch with an adults-only break at Pethers Rainforest Retreat, nestled in the lush treetops of the Gold Coast Hinterland. Unwind with an escape in an ultra-spacious, secluded luxury treehouse hidden in the sub-tropical rainforest. Enjoy a fresh daily breakfast hamper, welcome bottle of sparkling wine to share, decadent cheese platter for two, a welcome chocolate bar on arrival and a guaranteed late 12pm checkout.

title: Gold Coast Hinterland Treehouse Escape with Daily Breakfast Hamper
description: Discover tranquillity and take the romance up a notch with an adults-only break at Pethers Rainforest Retreat in the lush treetops of the Tambourine Mountain rainforest in the Gold Coast Hinterland. Unwind with an escape in an ultra-spacious, secluded luxury treehouse hidden in the sub-tropical rainforest. Enjoy a fresh daily breakfast hamper, welcome bottle of sparkling wine, decadent cheese platter, welcome chocolates and a guaranteed late 12pm checkout.

title: Luxe Gold Coast Hinterland Cabin Retreat
description:
Disconnect and surrender to tranquility with a luxurious stay at Hazelwood Estate - a recently-opened, boutique hinterland retreat on the site of a privately-owned polo and Wagyu farm. Just a short 40-minute drive from the Gold Coast, on the fringe of Lamington National Park, this gorgeous property is a haven of serenity - perfect for a touch of romance in the countryside.

Wake to views across Beechmont plateau’s undulating hills and step onto the expansive deck of your luxe cabin to enjoy a hot cup of coffee amid the rural bliss. When it’s time to leave your idyllic hideaway, you might enjoy a private horseback tour of the Scenic Rim, put on your hiking boots and explore some of Australia’s best bushwalking trails, watch visiting players and teams practise on the polo field, tuck into locally-sourced produce at The Paddock Restaurant, or indulge with some downtime at Spa by Hazelwood. The choice is yours to do as much or as little as you desire.
offer_address: 422 Binna Burra Road, Beechmont 4211, Queensland, Australia

title: Luxe Queensland Hinterland Estate Retreat with Chef-Hatted Restaurant
description: The boutique hinterland Beechmont Estate retreat rests where the beauty of Lamington National Park meets a uniquely Australian country elegance. Just 50 minutes from the glittering Gold Coast, this gorgeous property allows you to lose yourself in the rolling hills of the Scenic Rim - put on your hiking boots to enjoy some of Australia’s best bushwalking trails, indulge in a picnic on the grounds of the estate, explore the property on bike or indulge at the day spa.
offer_address: 422 Binna Burra Road, Beechmont 4211, Queensland, Australia
